backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, contacts, and transaction history with access‑controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI theme and branding updates to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their roles in the UI and theme.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions providing color tokens and dark‑mode values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling auth, profile setup, routing, and layout rendering.
Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalDi: Displays and allows copying of the authenticated user's principal.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for initial user profile creation with name entry.
frontend/src/components/contacts/Contact: Dialog for creating or editing contacts with validation and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component with header, navigation, and content areas, handling auth state and page navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/WalletLog: Renders the app logo and name with styled visuals.
frontend/src/components/wallet/Recipient: Popover contact picker that lets users search and select saved contacts as transaction recipients.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, balances, transactions, and contacts through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark themes and custom neon-style UI effects.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Defines app branding constants like app name and token labels.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, principal truncation, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validation helpers for recipients and amounts, plus balance formatting and amount parsing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Displays and manages contacts with add, edit, and delete actions using dialogs and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows ICP and Infinity token balances with loading, error handling, and a manual refresh option.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Fetches and filters locally stored transaction history with tabs, loading states, and refresh capability.
frontend/src/pages/SendPage.tsx: Handles sending assets through a multi‑step form with validation, confirmation, and success flow.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended colors based on CSS variables, custom radii, fonts, shadows, and background gradients, and includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, features, and requirements for building the Infinity Wallet app, including branding, authentication, wallet functions, theming, and image asset needs.
